articles.description: MC Exclusive Interview | In a wide-ranging conversation with Moneycontrol, Nilekani opened up on his vision for India, how long he plans to stay at Infosys, why Aadhaar is irreversible and what startups can do to defend themselves against the funding winter
articles.content: In 2008, Infosys co-founder and chairman Nandan Nilekani wrote a book called Imagining India, where he argued that the country's future rests on more than just simple economic growth; it also depends… [+14167 chars]
